nodes.text: A High Lord was a presiding member on the Circle of Lords, the ruling council of the Lost Tribe of Sith on the Wild Space planet Kesh. They held their meetings in the capitol building of the capital city of Tahv. There were seven High Lords on the Circle; they ranked above the thirteen Lords that sat on the Circle, but below the Grand Lord. There were a total of seven High Lords at a time in the Lost Tribe.
As of 41 ABY, two of the High Lords were female; they were addressed as "Lady."
